description: Defines a custom Polymer web component 'paper-tab' styled as a tab, including styles, behaviors, and scripts for interaction.

classes.name: paper-tab
classes.description: A custom web component styled as a tab, with behaviors for control state, button state, and ripple effect.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Initializes ripple properties when component is ready.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Updates noink setting when component is attached to DOM.

methods.name: _updateNoink
methods.description: Sets noink property based on parent component or own setting.

methods.name: get _parentNoink
methods.description: Checks if parent component has noink property set.
